title: New blog / new post / rye bread / wheat toast
body:
As you can see, the entire Moxie Cinema website has changed. I didn't like the idea of having the blog's design differ so drastically from the main website. My goal was to incorporate the two, and I think I did a pretty good job. I realize this design is a bit more graphics-laden than the last, but hopefully the majority of you are using broadband so it shouldn't amount to much of a difference in load time. You'll notice a few bugs here and there (like the old menu at the top of the forum page), but they'll be ironed out as new pages become available. As with everything Moxie-related, patience is key.

As for the theater, it's still coming along. I'm getting ready to head over there in the next hour to finish mudding and sanding the Cinebar wall. I was hoping the auditorium walls would be mudded by last Friday, but that wasn't the case. If we're lucky, they'll have their first coat of mud today. Keep your fingers crossed.

On another front, the Moxie telephone crisis has been solved, but more on that later... I haven't eaten at all today, and my stomach is rolling. A large bean burrito awaits.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: RSS stands for Really Simple Syndication. Users can subscribe to a particular RSS feed (like the one up top) and have new posts automatically sent to them via their RSS reader. Most blogs include content in their RSS feed. I, however, do not.
